title: CE-2 Transport
wikitext:
[[File:CE-2Transport.jpg|400px|thumb|right]] '''Craft''': Corellian Engineering Corporation CE-2 Transport
'''Type''': Light freighter
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 100 meters
'''Skill''': Space transports: CE-2 transport
'''Crew''': 2
'''Crew Skill''': Varies widely
'''Passengers''': 2
'''Cargo Capacity''': 50,000 metric tons
'''Consumables''': 2 months
'''Cost''': 200,000 (new), 95,000 (used)
'''Hyperdrive Multiplier''': x2
'''Hyperdrive Backup''': x12
'''Nav Computer''': Yes
'''Maneuverability''': 1D
'''Space''': 3

'''Sensors''': *Passive: 10/0D *Scan: 25/1D *Search: 40/2D *Focus: 2/2D+2 '''Capsule''': An odd hybrid of a light freighter and space barge, the CE-2 is an experiment intended to use a light freighter configuration to move barge cargo pods. The result has sold decently well, and may herald a change in medium freighter design.
